name: gccsa_g29_total_hsehold_income_by_hsehold_census_2016
title: GCCSA-G29 Total Household Income (Weekly) by Household Composition-Census 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Australia (CC BY 2.5 AU)

keyword: household composition,household income,census,2016,gcp,g29,gccsa,weekly income,general community profile,
abstract:
GCCSA based data for Total Household Income (Weekly) by Household Composition, in General Community Profile (GCP), 2016 Census. Count of occupied private dwellings. Total Household Income (Weekly) is calculated by summing the personal incomes reported by all household members aged 15 years and over. Excludes 'Visitors only' and 'Other non-classifiable' households. Comprises 'Lone person' and 'Group households'. The data is by GCCSA 2016 boundaries. Periodicity: 5-Yearly.
Note: There are small random adjustments made to all cell values to protect the confidentiality of data. These adjustments may cause the sum of rows or columns to differ by small amounts from table totals.
For more information visit the data source: http://www.abs.gov.au/census.
